thread.title: BRIEF-Seadrill Partners in one-well contract for West Capella rig

title: BRIEF-Seadrill Partners in one-well contract for West Capella rig
text: March 19, 2018 / 1:08 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Seadrill Partners in one-well contract for West Capella rig Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Seadrill Partners Llc: * SEADRILL PARTNERS ANNOUNCES CONTRACT AWARD FOR THE WEST CAPELLA * ‍SEADRILL PARTNERS ANNOUNCES CONTRACT AWARD FOR WEST CAPELLA​ * ‍HAS SECURED A ONE WELL CONTRACT WITH REPSOL ARUBA, B.V FOR WEST CAPELLA IN ARUBA​ * ‍CONTRACT IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE IN JUNE 2018 AFTER COMPLETING UNIT’S CURRENT CONTRACT WITH REPSOL IN GABON AND BACKLOG IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $6.4 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Terje Solsvik)
